title: Suchen Toplaner für Dynamic Queue [Plat 1+] / Looking for a Toplaner [Plat 1+]
body:
Hey guys,

we are looking for a decent top laner to stomp dynamic queue and start playing  tournaments.

We neither have a team name nor we have a teamspeak server but we are all pretty good guys.
We communicate with Skype. 

What we expect from you:

- you should have a decent champion pool but you should have like 2 or 3 champs you are a beast with.
- you should be at least 16 years old ( we are all 18-20)

if you are interested and want some more information go ahead and add

**d Obito
**

replies.body: Das hier ist ein deutsches Forum, just saying :P
